Package org.lwjgl.opencl

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CLContextCallback
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the CreateContext or CreateContextFromType methods.
    CLContextCallback.Str
    Extends CLContextCallback with an alternative version that accepts a string.
    CLEventCallback
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the SetEventCallback method.
    CLMemObjectDestructorCallback
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the SetMemObjectDestructorCallback method.
    CLNativeKernel
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the EnqueueNativeKernel method.
    CLNativeKernel.Buf
    Extends CLNativeKernel with an alternative version that accepts a buffer.
    CLPlatform.Filter
    Simple filter interface.
    CLProgramCallback
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the BuildProgram, CompileProgram and LinkProgram methods.
    CLSVMFreeCallback
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the EnqueueSVMFree method.
    CLSVMFreeCallback.Buf
    Extends CLSVMFreeCallback with an alternative version that accepts a buffer.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AMDBusAddressableMemory
    Native bindings to the amd_bus_addressable_memory extension.
    AMDDeviceAttributeQuery
    Native bindings to the amd_device_attribute_query extension.
    AMDDeviceBoardName
    Native bindings to the amd_device_board_name extension.
    AMDDevicePersistentMemory
    Native bindings to the amd_device_persistent_memory extension.
    AMDDeviceProfilingTimerOffset
    Native bindings to the amd_device_profiling_timer_offset extension.
    AMDDeviceTopology
    Native bindings to the amd_device_topology extension.
    AMDOfflineDevices
    Native bindings to the amd_offline_devices extension.
    APPLEGLSharing
    Native bindings to the APPLE_gl_sharing extension.
    CL  
    cl_buffer_region
    Buffer region struct.
    cl_bus_address_amd
    Used in AMDBusAddressableMemory.clEnqueueMakeBuffersResidentAMD(long, int, java.nio.ByteBuffer, int, java.nio.ByteBuffer, int, java.nio.ByteBuffer, java.nio.ByteBuffer).
    cl_device_topology_amd
    The struct returned by CL10.clGetDeviceInfo(long, int, long, java.nio.ByteBuffer, java.nio.ByteBuffer) with param_name set to AMDDeviceTopology.CL_DEVICE_TOPOLOGY_AMD.
    cl_image_desc
    Image description struct.
    cl_image_format
    Image format struct.
    CL10
    The core OpenCL 1.0 functionality.
    CL10GL
    The OpenCL 1.0 OpenGL interoperability functionality.
    CL11
    The core OpenCL 1.1 functionality.
    CL12
    The core OpenCL 1.2 functionality.
    CL12GL
    The OpenCL 1.2 OpenGL interoperability functionality.
    CL20
    The core OpenCL 2.0 functionality.
    CLCapabilities
    Defines the capabilities of an OpenCL platform or device.
    CLContextCallback.StrAdapter
    A CLContextCallback.Str adapter.
    CLContextCallback.Util  
    CLDevice
    This class is a wrapper around a cl_device_id pointer.
    CLEventCallback.Util  
    CLMemObjectDestructorCallback.Util  
    CLNativeKernel.BufAdapter
    A CLNativeKernel.Buf adapter.
    CLNativeKernel.Util  
    CLPlatform
    This class is a wrapper around a cl_platform_id pointer.
    CLProgramCallback.Util  
    CLSVMFreeCallback.BufAdapter
    A CLSVMFreeCallback.Buf adapter.
    CLSVMFreeCallback.Util  
    CLUtil  
    Info
    This class provides methods that can be used to query information about OpenCL objects.
    INTELDevicePartitionByNames
    Native bindings to the intel_device_partition_by_names extension.
    INTELThreadLocalExec
    Native bindings to the intel_thread_local_exec extension.
    KHRDepthImages
    Native bindings to the khr_depth_images extension.
    KHRFP16
    Native bindings to the khr_fp16 extension.
    KHRFP64
    Native bindings to the khr_fp64 extension.
    KHRGLDepthImages
    Native bindings to the khr_gl_depth_images extension.
    KHRGLEvent
    Native bindings to the khr_gl_event extension.
    KHRGLMSAASharing
    Native bindings to the khr_gl_msaa_sharing extension.
    KHRGLSharing
    Native bindings to the khr_gl_sharing extension.
    KHRICD
    Native bindings to the khr_icd extension.
    KHRImage2DFromBuffer
    Native bindings to the khr_image2d_from_buffer extension.
    KHRInitializeMemory
    Native bindings to the khr_initialize_memory extension.
    KHRTerminateContext
    Native bindings to the khr_terminate_context extension.
    NVDeviceAttributeQuery
    Native bindings to the nv_device_attribute_query extension.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    OpenCLException
    A runtime exception thrown by LWJGL when it encounters an OpenCL error.
